data.message: Hi Facebook my official account is disabled I don't know why, I send my ID to Facebook. When I send the form it says " Thanks for contacting Facebook. You should receive an email response shortly. " my account was disabled in 7 months please help me to reenable my account. Thanks.

replies.message: Hi Muhammed. We don't restore accounts that were disabled for severe violations of the Facebook Community Standards. You can review the Community Standards at: http://on.fb.me/1fhWCXL -Hailey
But I want to restore my account my friends and family was in my old Facebook which is now disabled please reenable it I send my ID to Facebook
